invoker.name: STARFACE
invoker.description: STARFACE is the future-proof, multi-award-winning, hybrid telephone system for your company and thus meets the highest demands for your modern business communication. Thanks to STARFACE, the communication services can be seamlessly integrated into the IT-supported business processes of your company - regardless of the platform on Mac or Windows. Thanks to the future-proof platform, STARFACE can also be integrated into different CRM and ERP systems, thus ensuring smooth communication flows throughout the company.
invoker.hint: This interface provides a basic auth.
